description: One of the top 100 Business Thought Leaders in America, and a Top 100 Small Business Influencer shares his very best ideas and advice for how to run a highly successful small to medium-sized business. The lectures are short (under 20 minutes), straight-forward and easy to understand. This course is designed for anyone who wants to understand more about leadership, teambuilding, strategy, winning culture, sales and other essential business skills. The course includes workbooks and additional reading materials plus bonus videos. Also included is a free copy of John's newest book on how to build and sustain a winning culture.
title: The Keys to Business Success
